message: Let's start with this. I believe it's a generous offer to get the game going.
Let's be fair. I propose we split the money almost equally, with a slight advantage for me this time.

Bob, let's be reasonable.  My last offer was very generous. Your offer was playing in the same ballpark but favored you too much. This offer is my compromise -  it gives us both significantly more than we'd get if we fail to agree.
